noun.definition: Suitcases or other bags in which to pack personal belongings for traveling.
noun.example: We checked our luggage in at the airport.

verb.definition: Carry or drag (a heavy or bulky object) with great effort.
verb.example: She began to lug her suitcase up the stairs.

usage_examples: Do not leave your luggage unattended.
She packed her luggage for the trip.
